vscode-postgres.defaultDatabase.description: The default database on the default connection to use

vscode-postgres.showExplorer.description: Show or hide the database explorer.

vscode-postgres.prettyPrintJSONfields.description: Turns on/off pretty printing of JSON fields

vscode-postgres.setConnectionFromExplore.description: Controls whether selecting a database in explorer changes the current editor's connection

vscode-postgres.tableColumnSortOrder.description: Controls the order of the columns in the database explorer. Default is db-order which orders the columns as the were added to the table (how postgres reports them)

vscode-postgres.intervalFormat.description: Controls the display format for `interval` columns. Default is the iso_8601 standard which does not cover milliseconds.

vscode-postgres.virtualFolders.description: Controls virtual folders that are shown under schema. Currently only functions are supported.
